website_summaries.verdict: The speed of this self-propelled model will trick anyone into believing it’s the quietest gas-powered mower of all time.
pros: Speed options from 1.8 to 3.6 miles per hour

customer_reviews.title: Don't do business with this company!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mower for my husband. He didn't need it right away so he didn't open it until after the 30 day return window. When he opened it it had a wheel broken off and he had problems with both the mower and battery. Simple current played hard ball with us and would do nothing for us. If you buy from a 3rd party seller EGO won't honor their warranties on either the mower or battery.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle machine
customer_reviews.text: There are so many positive aspects, as compared to a gas-powered mower, that I won't even bother to list them. This is the greatest advance in mower technology that's ever come along!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Found wheel to be broken
customer_reviews.text: Received my EGO Self Propelled Lawn Mower on 11/30/2019. There was no need to open the package until Spring. I opened the package yesterday and found one of the wheels to be completely broken. It made me very sad because of all the positive reviews about EGO self propelled lawn mower. I registered my product and filed a complaint with EGO Customer service with regards to defective product. If I get a proper response for their customer service to fix this issue, I will update this review after get a chance to use the lawn mower. Otherwise, I intend to file a Customer Complaint in the Virginia Court.
customer_reviews.author: Virginian

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used and not a new item.
customer_reviews.text: Spending over $500 for a new item I expect to get a new item. This arrived used with grass clippings all over it. How used? Not sure. It has a warranty but am disappointed to buy someone else’s returned item after they either broke it or didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldogge

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent mower, lightweight, quiet, and gives a nice easy cut. This company is outstanding in it's customer service and would purchase again from them .
customer_reviews.author: BuckshotBabe

customer_reviews.title: Just fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's powered, as I mow on very steep hills that I couldn't safely push a regular mower up. Our lawn person needed to switch employment, and this mower not only let that be fine, but in a few weeks began saving money. I actually love making "lawn art" with this so quiet and easy mower! Used it all last summer and fall - reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener Smith

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for everything
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike so far this mower is well built and sturdy and does a great job, and the self propel feature is very controllable.
customer_reviews.author: Fred_C

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and so quiet
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower! I am a female senior citizen who is not in the best shape, but I can handle this quite easily. Several neighbors and passerbys stopped and commented on how quiet it is. The battery lasted for my front and backyard (about 1/3 acre) and still had power left. And it is so nice not to have to deal with gas and oil.
customer_reviews.author: gqtoo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 Mows
customer_reviews.text: Mower burned out after 6 mows. Started smoking and blade no longer turns. Customer support for a warranty claim is an absolute joke. No one calls you back. Complete waste of money. Don't buy an EGO.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper23456789

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My first time ever buying and using a battery powered mower. Easy to use right out of the box! Battery is good but uses almost 3/4 of battery on about 1/8 of an acre. But overall a great quiet and easy to use mower. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: No more gas and oil.
customer_reviews.text: Highly rated. Moved from big lot to small. Didn't need Cub Cadet zero turn anymore. Wanted cordless electric. This is best one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start and size is great even for women.
customer_reviews.text: This mower is very easy to use. I have a small lot, so battery life hasn't been a problem at all. I liked it so well I bought another for trimming around trees, etc. at my cottage.
customer_reviews.author: Ritz708

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. You can find the User manual online at the ego website. The self propelled is nice and even if you push it without the self propelled it is easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mower. I’ve got a big yard and can do the whole thing on a charge. It’s powerful enough to have no problems and I’ve had it for a year now. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: erobin

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: First time buying battery lawnmower Very pleased with battery life, very easy to use and mows lawn great!
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love my mower. I am a widow and the ease of use and the life of the battery take top place. I can mow my lawn and my neighbors lawn before the battery dies. The mower is quite, powerful and easy for me to handle. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Jewell

customer_reviews.title: mow entire yard on one charge.
customer_reviews.text: Good torque I was cutting grass at 3" tried at 2" and cut well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Invention!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to operate. I was able to figure out how how to use it on my own. After mowing nearly 6000 square feet , the battery was still working . I highly recommend the EGO 21 battery- operated lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Monteagudo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I love my Ego tools. This mower is legit. There is a bit of a learning curve as far as production vs. battery drain but it only takes one mow to figure it out. If you have a big yard or a yard with hills you will need at least two 7.5ah batteries. The biggest drawback with it is any kind of heavy workload drains the battery extremely fast. Also forget about using the bag. The weight of a half-full bag will again deplete your battery. Other than that it works as well or better than any gas mower I've had.
customer_reviews.author: James Orenthal K. Emmett Robsinson

customer_reviews.title: Not a Florida Lawnmower. Period
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't handle 1/4 acre of floratam grass with charging halfway through. bogs down in slightest moisture. after one year of residential use, battery is shot. My lost is 10000 sq ft, My house takes up 3200 sq ft and pool another 700, shed 120 so that 4000 sq ft that doesn't get mowed. Mower is too light and doesn't mow evenly. can't handle anything but the highest settings. Like I said, NOT A FLORIDA mower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks immediately; poor warranty
customer_reviews.text: Self propel feature broke immediately. EGO refuses to honor their 5 year warranty. Unless you want to push your self-propelled mower and/or spend hours trying to get warranty repairs from a manufacturer that really doesn't seem to care if they help you, you may want to consider another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this lawn mower because it is very quiet compared to gas mowers and it gets the job done. I used to wear earplugs when using my riding lawn mower but I don't need plugs with this one. My riding lawn mower is 15 years old and started vibrating too much while mowing, also the deck might need to be adjusted because it is making a mess of my front yard. This Ego lawnmower mulches very well as long as you don't go too fast, some people here say that it won't do a good job in mulch mode, they say this because they don't know what they are doing. I bought mine from home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Nate2018

customer_reviews.title: battery is  the price of mower i need to buy a new mower because they sell junk with no support
customer_reviews.text: this lawn mower is junk battery went out after three years the battery is the price of the mower never purchase junk on line
customer_reviews.author: douglas irvine

customer_reviews.title: Elegant design.
customer_reviews.text: Got mine at Home Depot. It feels great to use it. All aspects of the mower work perfectly. Came with the 5.0 amp-hour battery. Larger battery (7.5 A-Hr) available but not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jim.Peter@jhu.edu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than gas mowers that are so difficult to start and maintain, or corded electric mower! It folds up for transporting and storage really well; even fits into my small Toyota Echo trunk. Small battery does not last long enough, but larger battery is great.
customer_reviews.author: VR outdoors

product_meta.title: EGO 21 in. 56-Volt Lithium-ion Cordless Walk Behind Self Propelled Mower Kit with 7.5Ah Battery and Charger Included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
